seo: CVE-2024-4956, Sonatype Nexus Repository, 本地文件读取, 路径遍历, 漏洞检测
seo_en: CVE-2024-4956, Sonatype Nexus Repository, Local File Inclusion, Path Traversal, Vulnerability Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测Sonatype Nexus Repository Manager 3是否存在CVE-2024-4956漏洞，该漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过路径遍历读取系统文件。
summary_en: This plugin detects the CVE-2024-4956 vulnerability in Sonatype Nexus Repository Manager 3, which allows unauthenticated attackers to read system files via path traversal.
